attributes.title: TERRIBLE! TAKE THIS APP DOWN
attributes.review: I am a trump supporter wanting to download this app and show my respect and love for our president but this app lags and took exactly 13 hours, 24 minutes and 15 seconds to download. WHAT IS THIS? I THEN GOT A NOTIFICATION THAT MY PHONE HAS A VIRUS IN IT AND I AM NOT HAPPY. APPLE NEEDS TO TAKE THIS APP DOWN BECAUSE THE SERVICE IS TERRIBLE

attributes.title: Stay Safe!!!
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I had to immediately put in my phone number and started getting very creepy text! I feel very unsafe using this app!

attributes.title: Pls do not download it
attributes.review: It takes about a good 100 hours to download it I wish I could eat it a 3 but I can’t it takes just takes to long to download sorry 😭

attributes.title: Worst app!!
attributes.review: This app took forever to download! I literally have to type my phone number in to get spam messages just to see the app. Do not download!!! I’ll continue supporting my Democrats✌🏼

attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: Do not recommend downloading this app. Had a terrible experience, and I am extremely disappointed that I can no longer recuperate the time that I wasted on this application.

attributes.title: I hated it
attributes.review: This was the worst, he made America WORSE, he is bringing back slavery, and he is a child predator, he disrespect all women, he is races, he is DISCUSSING he did not bring any peace or justice to the country/ world ( like Obama did), I hate this app it needs to be tooling down🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Trump2020
attributes.review: Love the app it is great I took only one second to download vote trump 2020

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: This dosent even deserves a rating, it took 4 days to instal and my iPad crashed now I gotta get a new 2milliona dollar pop socket also... the app is horrible and the screen automatically turns orange every 3 seconds HORRIBLE

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it crashed my phone! I had to PAY to get my phone fixed because of this stupid app!! Absolutely awful!

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: I was not very pleased when the orange Cheeto man came up on my screen 😿. I was shocked honey. Please delete this app from the App Store it is terrible!!! My phone was hacked because of it and I have been followed by orange bugs ever since then. 😭🙈
